com.epoch.assgts
Class HWDescr

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.assgts.HWDescr
All Implemented Interfaces:
HWDescrConstants, StaticLimits, UserConstants
public class HWDescr
extends Object
implements HWDescrConstants, StaticLimits, UserConstants

Holds the attributes of an assignment, including question, grading parameters, extensions, and question dependencies.

Field Summary

          Whether to limit the number of tries.

          Maps question ID numbers that should not be displayed (keys) until another question (value) is answered correctly.

          Due date of the assignment.

          Remarks about this assignment.

Field Detail

id

public int id
Unique ID of this assignment.

courseId

public int courseId
ID number of the course in which this assignment resides.

instructorId

public String instructorId
Creator of this assignment.

name

private String name
Name of this assignment.

remarks

private String remarks
Remarks about this assignment.

flags

private int flags
Flags for student visibility, recording after the due date, and whether the assignment is an exam.

creationDate

public Date creationDate
Creation date of the assignment.

dueDate

private Date dueDate
Due date of the assignment. May be altered for individual students by extensions.

allowUnlimitedTries

private boolean allowUnlimitedTries
Whether to limit the number of tries.

maxTries

private int maxTries
The number of permitted tries; -1 if no limit.

qGrps

private List<HWQGroup> qGrps
A list of HWQGroups, each of which contains a list of one or more questions and the number of questions to pick from each group when an assignment is instantiated.

gradingParams

private String[][][] gradingParams
Parameters used to adjust grades, as originally entered. First dimension represents attempt-dependent grading, time-dependent grading, or points-per-question grading; second dimension represents limits or factors; third dimension is for each question. We use Oracle to do the calculations based on these values.

extensions

private Map<String,String> extensions
Map of students who have extensions, and the length of their extensions in days (usually) or minutes.

dependencies

private Map<Integer,Integer> dependencies
Maps question ID numbers that should not be displayed (keys) until another question (value) is answered correctly. Loaded when HWSession or HWCreateSession is initiated.

permissibleRxnCondnsStr

private String permissibleRxnCondnsStr
String describing reaction conditions, used to communicate with front end.

changed

public final boolean[] changed
Used to indicate whether a particular value has been changed from the value stored in the DB.

setQGroups

public final void setQGroups(String qString)

setGradingParams

public void setGradingParams(String[][] gp,
                             int type)
Sets one type of grading parameters of the assignment. Called ONLY from HWRead, which is why we don't set changed[GRADE_PARAMS] to true.

Parameters:
gp - one type of grading parameters of the assignment
type - type of grading parameter

setGradingParams

public void setGradingParams(String paramsStr,
                             int type)
Converts a grading parameters string to a pair of arrays, storing the value in this HWDescr. Used for XML and for communication with the front end.

Parameters:
paramsStr - the string encoding the /-separated limits and factors (factors only for points-per-question parameters)
type - the type of grading parameters
